chart_description: This chart represents the percentage of time the CPU spent in a state of full pressure, where it is unable to handle all required processes at once.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: This dimension shows the percentage of time the CPU spent under full pressure for the previous 10-second interval.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: This dimension shows the percentage of time the CPU spent under full pressure for the previous 5-minute interval.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: This dimension shows the percentage of time the CPU spent under full pressure for the previous 1-minute interval.
